function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ambiguity and inconsistencies in COVID-19 statistics due to economic expediencies and ambiguous behavior of the virus","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis of the virus's demeanor, leading to potential misinterpretation of the spread and impact of the virus","Mitigation":"Increased transparency in reporting, standardized data collection methods, and independent verification of statistics","Technologies":"Data analytics for pattern recognition and anomaly detection","People":"Scholars, public health officials, and policymakers","Owner":"Health agencies and government regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Forced stoppage of construction projects leading to fiscal losses for both big and small construction companies","Impact":"Financial hardships, delays in project completion, and reduced work rate","Mitigation":"Government support, financial aid, and flexible payment schedules","Technologies":"Project management software for remote monitoring and collaboration","People":"Construction companies, workers, and project managers","Owner":"Government and financial institutions"},{"Description":"Impacts of COVID-19 on the supply chain system, leading to operational and disruption risks","Impact":"Disruptions in the supply chain, delays in deliveries, and increased material costs","Mitigation":"Diversification of suppliers, risk assessment and contingency planning, and adoption of digital supply chain management tools","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, predictive analytics for demand forecasting","People":"Supply chain managers, logistics professionals, and procurement teams","Owner":"Supply chain management professionals and business leaders"}]}
